participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys making new connections.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i like to workout a a times a week. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Reserved yet warm-hearted, values connection despite a lack of family.
participant_2.background: i've zero family that i'm close to. my favorite food is papaya. i am a bee farmer. my name is george.

content.text: My name is george, what is your name?
i've zero family that i'm close to and I wish to be a relative to you
i'm a drummer in a popular band and my favorite food is papaya. What is your favorite food?
